column2: Court is  of the view that the explanation for the delay proffered  by the petitioner in

column1: making a prompt application for relisting is  plausible and acceptable.

column2: In the circumstances I set aside order dated  12th October 2011 dismissing the appeal

column1: and  make order restating the appeal for argument.

column2: The  Registrar  is  directed  to  communicate  this  order  to  the  District  Court,  Matale

column1: forthwith and  recall the record  in  DIC  1920/P
column2: from the District Court of Matale  and
upon  receipt  thereof  in  the  Court  of Appeal,  the  Registrar  is  directed  to  list  this

column1: matter to be  mentioned for the purpose of fixing this matter for argument.
The application for relisting the appeal is thus allowed.

column2: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
